mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainSetting(trCategory, roomNum, trainSeq,roomGrade, seatRow, seatColumn) VALUES(#{trCategory}, #{roomNum}, trainSetting_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomGrade}, #{seatRow}, #{seatColumn})
mapper.select: SELECT trainSeq, trCategory, COUNT(roomNum) trainRoomCount, SUM(seatRow*seatColumn) trainSeatCount FROM trainSetting group by trainSeq,trCategory
